tool_description: Aggregates metadata from multiple DICOM series into comprehensive study-level summaries and creates structured reports.

series_paths.description: Array of paths to DICOM series directories or individual files

include_statistics.description: Include statistical analysis of study data

aggregate_image_metrics.description: Aggregate image quality and technical metrics

error_messages: No valid series found: None of the provided paths contain valid DICOM series.
Inconsistent study data: Series belong to different studies and cannot be aggregated.
Metadata extraction failed: Unable to extract metadata from one or more series.
Series limit exceeded: Too many series provided (maximum 50 series per study).
usage: Provide array of series_paths from the same study and configure aggregation options. Tool creates comprehensive study summaries from series metadata.

total_series_count.description: Number of series in the study

total_images_count.description: Total number of images across all series

modalities_present.description: List of imaging modalities found in the study

study_date.description: Date when the study was performed

acquisition_duration_minutes.description: Total acquisition time for the study in minutes
